License.title: License
License.description: Represents an environmental license for a project.

Service.title: Service
Service.description: Represents a service offered by the company with its cost and price.

description.description: A detailed description of the service.

cost.description: The internal cost to perform the service.

price.description: The selling price of the service.

Oficio.title: Ofício
Oficio.description: Represents an official document or communication.

oficioNumber.description: The automatically generated number for the document (e.g., '001/2024'). Assigned on completion.

year.description: The year the document was finalized, used for numbering.

sequence.description: The sequence number for the year.

body.description: The full content of the document.

municipio.description: The city where the document is being issued.

estado.description: The state where the document is being issued.

dataEmissao.description: The date the document is issued.

assinanteId.description: The UID of the user signing the document.

assinanteNome.description: The name of the user signing the document.

assinanteCargo.description: The role/position of the user signing the document.

assinaturaDigitalUrl.description: URL of the uploaded digital signature image.

createdBy.description: The UID of the user who created the document.

creatorName.description: The name of the user who created the document.

OficioCounter.title: Ofício Counter
OficioCounter.description: Tracks the last sequence number for ofícios in a given year.

lastSequence.description: The last used sequence number for the year.

DispensaPEA.title: Dispensa de Programa de Educação Ambiental
DispensaPEA.description: Representa uma solicitação de dispensa do Programa de Educação Ambiental.

AuditLog.title: Audit Log
AuditLog.description: Represents a single audit log entry for user actions.

userId.description: The UID of the user who performed the action.

action.description: A key representing the action performed (e.g., 'login', 'create_client').

details.description: Additional context for the action, like the ID of a created document.

timestamp.description: The server timestamp when the action was logged.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a chat conversation between two or more users.

participants.description: List of user UIDs in the chat.

lastMessage.description: The text of the last message sent.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message within a chat.

deletedFor.description: List of user UIDs who have 'deleted' this message for themselves.

Client.title: Client
Client.description: Represents a commercial client for financial and CRM purposes.

cpfCnpj.description: CPF or CNPJ of the client.

identidade.description: Número do RG ou outro documento de identidade.

emissor.description: Órgão emissor do documento de identidade.

Fornecedor.title: Fornecedor
Fornecedor.description: Represents a supplier or service provider.

cpfCnpj.description: CPF or CNPJ of the supplier.

serviceType.description: Type of service provided by the supplier.

Empreendedor.title: Empreendedor
Empreendedor.description: Represents a technical client (empreendedor) for environmental projects.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Empreendedor entity.

projectIds.description: References to Projects associated with the empreendedor.

cpfCnpj.description: CPF or CNPJ of the empreendedor.

entityType.description: Type of entity (Pessoa Física, Pessoa Jurídica, Produtor Rural).

correspondenceCep.description: CEP (Postal Code) of the correspondence address.

userId.description: The ID of the user associated with this empreendedor, if any.

sourceClientId.description: The ID of the original client record if this empreendedor was imported.

FaunaStudy.title: Fauna Study
FaunaStudy.description: Represents a technical project or report for fauna management studies (Inventory, Monitoring, Rescue).

documentName.description: The display name for an externally uploaded document.

fileUrl.description: The URL of the uploaded document in Firebase Storage.

AnaliseSolo.title: Análise de Solo
AnaliseSolo.description: Represents a soil analysis for a specific crop.

AtividadeAgricola.title: Atividade Agrícola
AtividadeAgricola.description: Represents a single agricultural activity entry.

AtividadeAgropecuaria.title: Atividade Agropecuária
AtividadeAgropecuaria.description: Represents a single livestock activity entry.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents an environmental project, license, or study, aligned with Minas Gerais legislation.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Project entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User responsible for this project.

assignedTeam.description: List of user IDs assigned to this project.

activity.description: Activity code and description from DN 217.

propertyName.description: Name of the property for the project/empreendimento.

zoneType.description: The zone type of the project location.

correspondenceIsSame.description: Flag indicating if correspondence address is same as main address.

district.description: District or Locality of the empreendimento.

ownerCondition.description: Condition of the empreendedor (e.g., Proprietário, Arrendatário).

isInConservationUnit.description: Is the project within a conservation unit or its buffer zone?

managementCategory.description: Management category of the conservation unit.

managingBody.description: Managing body of the conservation unit.

criteriosDN130.description: Additional criteria for class framing according to DN 130/2008.

barragemAlternativas.description: Information about locational alternatives for the dam.

enum: Menor que 5 vezes área do lago
Entre 5 e 10 vezes a área do lago
Maior que 10 vezes a área do lago

equipments.description: List of equipment and vehicles on the property.

physicalStructures.description: List of existing physical structures/improvements on the property.

analiseSolo.description: Soil analysis data for different crops.

atividadesAgricolas.description: Agricultural activities broken down by type.

issuingBody.description: The environmental body that issued the permit (e.g., SEMAD, SUPRAM).

expirationDate.description: Date the permit expires. Renewal must be requested 120 days prior.

status.description: Current status of the environmental permit.

description.description: Description and scope of the environmental permit.

fileUrl.description: URL of the uploaded document file (e.g., PDF, JPG) in Firebase Storage.

Request.title: Request
Request.description: Represents an initial request for a new environmental process.

CompanySettings.title: Company Settings
CompanySettings.description: Stores general company settings, including branding and document templates.

headerImageUrl.description: URL for the report header image.

footerImageUrl.description: URL for the report footer image.

watermarkImageUrl.description: URL for the report watermark image.

WaterPermit.title: WaterPermit
WaterPermit.description: Represents a water usage permit (Outorga de Uso de Água).

id.description: Unique identifier for the WaterPermit entity.

permitNumber.description: The official permit number (Portaria de Outorga).

description.description: Purpose of the water permit (e.g., groundwater abstraction, surface water diversion).

fileUrl.description: URL of the uploaded permit document.

pontosDeMonitoramento.description: List of monitoring points associated with this water permit.

ManualMonitoringLog.title: Manual Monitoring Log
ManualMonitoringLog.description: Represents a single manual monitoring entry for a water permit point.

pontoId.description: Identifier of the monitoring point within the permit.

startTime.description: Time the pump was turned on.

endTime.description: Time the pump was turned off.

flowRateLps.description: Instantaneous flow rate in Liters per second.

flowRateM3h.description: Instantaneous flow rate in Cubic meters per hour.

userId.description: UID of the user who made the log.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the log was created.

EnvironmentalIntervention.title: EnvironmentalIntervention
EnvironmentalIntervention.description: Represents an authorization for environmental intervention (e.g., vegetation removal).

issuingBody.description: The environmental body that issued the authorization (e.g., IEF, SEMAD).

description.description: Type or description of the intervention (e.g., native vegetation suppression).

fileUrl.description: URL of the uploaded authorization document.

Condicionante.title: Condicionante
Condicionante.description: Represents a single environmental condition or requirement for a license or permit.

referenceId.description: ID of the associated Project (license) or WaterPermit (outorga).

referenceType.description: The type of document the condition is linked to.

description.description: The full description of the environmental condition.

dueDate.description: The deadline for complying with the condition.

status.description: The current compliance status of the condition.

recurrence.description: How often the condition needs to be met.

fileUrl.description: URL of the uploaded proof of compliance document.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Invoice entity.

status.description: Status of the invoice (e.g., Paid, Unpaid, Overdue).

fileUrl.description: URL of the uploaded invoice/boleto file in Firebase Storage.

CommercialProposal.title: Commercial Proposal
CommercialProposal.description: Represents a commercial proposal or quote.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CommercialProposal entity.

empreendimento.description: Name of the project/enterprise this proposal is for.

validUntilDate.description: Date the proposal is valid until.

items.description: List of services or products offered in the proposal.

amount.description: Total amount of the proposal, calculated from items.

fileUrl.description: URL of the uploaded proposal file in Firebase Storage.
URL to the uploaded signed contract PDF.

Appointment.title: Appointment
Appointment.description: Represents an appointment in the calendar.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Appointment entity.
Unique identifier for the Revenue entity.

clientId.description: Optional reference to the client who made the payment.

fileUrl.description: URL of the uploaded receipt file in Firebase Storage.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Expense entity.

fileUrl.description: URL of the uploaded receipt file in Firebase Storage.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SustainabilityReport entity.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

role.description: The role of the user, determining their permissions.

status.description: The status of the user account.

cpf.description: CPF to link a user to a client.

cnpjs.description: CNPJs to link a user to one or more clients.

isOnline.description: Indicates if the user is currently online.

lastLogin.description: Timestamp of the user's last login.

Opportunity.title: Opportunity
Opportunity.description: Represents a sales opportunity or deal in the CRM pipeline.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Opportunity entity.

name.description: Name or title of the opportunity.

value.description: Estimated monetary value of the opportunity.

closeDate.description: Expected closing date for the deal.

stage.description: Current stage in the sales pipeline.

assignedTo.description: User ID of the sales representative assigned to this opportunity.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Represents a contact or lead in the CRM.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Contact entity.

status.description: Status of the lead (e.g., New, Contacted, Qualified).

metodologiaAtracaoFauna.description: List of methodologies for fauna attraction.

opcaoPrada.description: Option for PRADA submission (WebAmbiente or Projeto-Técnico).

PTRF.title: PTRF
PTRF.description: Represents a PTRF (Projeto Técnico de Recomposição de Flora) form.

RCA.title: RCA
RCA.description: Represents an Environmental Control Report (Relatório de Controle Ambiental).

zeeSocioeconomico.description: ZEE Socioeconomico data for multiple municipalities

PCA.title: PCA
PCA.description: Represents an Environmental Control Plan (Plano de Controle Ambiental).

id.description: Unique identifier for the PCA document.

titulo.description: Title of the Term of Reference.

objeto.description: The specific environmental study required (EIA/RIMA, PCA, etc.).

fundamentacaoLegal.description: The legal basis for the study.

PIA.title: PIA
PIA.description: Represents a Environmental Intervention Plan (Plano de Intervenção Ambiental).

id.description: Unique identifier for the PIA document.

EiaRima.title: EIA/RIMA
EiaRima.description: Represents an Environmental Impact Study and Report.

Inspection.title: Inspection
Inspection.description: Represents an inspection or survey record.

inspectorId.description: UID of the user who performed the inspection.

inspectorName.description: Name of the user who performed the inspection.

status.description: The status of the inspection record.

accompaniedBy.description: Name of the person who accompanied the inspection.

signatureUrl.description: URL of the uploaded digital signature image.

inconformidades.description: List of non-conformities found during the inspection.

description.description: Detailed notes and findings of the non-conformity.

imageUrls.description: List of URLs for uploaded images related to the non-conformity.

userId.description: The UID of the user this notification is for.

description.description: The detailed message of the notification.

link.description: An optional URL to a relevant page.

isRead.description: Whether the user has read the notification.

createdAt.description: The server timestamp when the notification was created.

CharcoalProductionPerformance.title: Charcoal Production Performance
CharcoalProductionPerformance.description: Represents a performance report for charcoal production.

mesReferencia.description: The reference month for the report (YYYY-MM).

TransporteResiduosPerigosos.title: Transporte de Resíduos Perigosos
TransporteResiduosPerigosos.description: Representa um relatório descritivo para transporte de resíduos perigosos.

name.description: Name or identifier for the template.

url.description: URL of the uploaded template file.

dispensaPea.description: Stores all requests for PEA waiver.

oficioCounters/{year}.description: Tracks sequence numbers for ofícios per year.

clients.description: Stores all commercial client information for CRM and billing.

fornecedores.description: Stores all suppliers information for financial purposes.

faunaStudies.description: Stores all fauna studies (projects and reports).

projects.description: Stores all environmental projects, licenses, and studies. Contains an `empreendedorId` field to link to the empreendedor.

companySettings.description: Stores company-wide settings, like branding assets for reports.

outorgas.description: Stores all water usage permits (Outorgas). Contains an `empreendedorId` field.

manualMonitoringLogs.description: Stores all manual monitoring logs for water permits.

intervencoes.description: Stores all environmental intervention authorizations. Contains an `empreendedorId` field.

condicionantes.description: Stores all environmental conditions for licenses and permits.

invoices.description: Stores all invoices. Contains a `clientId` field to link to the client.

commercialProposals.description: Stores all commercial proposals/quotes. Contains a `clientId` field to link to the client.

contracts.description: Stores all service contracts. Contains a `clientId` field to link to the client.

appointments.description: Stores all appointments. Contains a `clientId` field to link to the client.

sustainabilityReports.description: Stores all sustainability reports. Contains a `clientId` field to link to the client.

revenues.description: Stores all revenue records for financial tracking.

expenses.description: Stores all expense records for financial tracking.

users.description: Stores application user profiles, including their role for permissions.

users/{userId}/notifications.description: Stores notifications for a specific user.

opportunities.description: Stores all sales opportunities for the CRM.

contacts.description: Stores all contacts and leads for the CRM.

eiaRimas.description: Stores all Environmental Impact Studies and Reports (EIA/RIMA).

inspections.description: Stores all inspection and survey records.
